Articles.Content: Now, by this, I don't mean how to use the jetpack to strafe and float around a station. Actually, I'm talking about flipping your Kerbals over. Like, in some of the Danny2462 videos where he flips a falling Kerbal upside down and bounces him to safety. How does he do that?
Click and drag on the kerbal with your left mouse button. Multiple draggings may be necessary to get the desired effect.
Thanks for the tip. I'd always wondered how you rotated Kerbals, too.
Yeah, this was a totally new realization to me. Much obliged!
